messages.subject: Re: New Foundation Study on Screen Time for Child...
messages.msgSnippet: ... My mil would be hollering at YOU! She can t even believe that I like to read while riding shotgun on long drives. You should be looking at all the scenery
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Genant2@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 11/2/03 8:55:16 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> bunsofaluminum60@h... writes:
>
> > AND
> > they're starting to show up in new mini-vans.
> >
> >
>
> We have a TV/VCR in our SUV and love it.
> Pam G
>

My mil would be hollering at YOU! She can't even believe that I like
to read while riding shotgun on long drives. "You should be looking
at all the scenery going by!" petesakes...

blessings, HeidiC

>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
